Articles.Content: What is the purpose of the Ram Air Intake or the Radial Engine Body? Or how do i use them correctly? Because i never saw any different in the power of my engines when using them. And the wiki does not help me at all.

Hi Minato and welcome to the forums!

Ram jets, circular intakes and engine nacelles are only cosmetic for the moment, putting them on your craft serves no function other than to make it look nicer.

Hope this helped.
Really?My planes engines are not overheating too much after that.
Maybe it's because they have a HeatDissipation value in the CFG
